content: are you looking forward to living a country life feel the rustic beauty by crocheting a farmhouse granny square with a daisy flower it perfectly captures that cozy countryside charm with its sweet white daisy featuring a golden center fresh green leaves all set against a soft periwinkle blue background the white petals use popcorn stitches for that lovely dimensional effect while bobble stitches create the textured green leaves and that gorgeous raised blue border that frames everything perfectly
